other_tests.date: Hospital day 18 after admission in June 2007 and June 2008
other_tests.findings: Some improvement after the first treatment; complete remission of symptoms by the sixth treatment.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Responded to ECT on two separate occasions. Symptoms resolved rapidly during both hospitalizations.

other_tests.date: Hospital day 3 during the second admission in June 2008.
other_tests.findings: Symptoms resolved entirely after four treatments.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Patient returned to baseline functioning after the course of ECT.
